Industries: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Biotechnology, Food and Beverage, Pharmaceutical, Wellness
Description: Brightseed uses artificial intelligence and machine learning to discover the potential of plant compounds for various applications.
Top 5 Investors: Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation, Temasek Holdings, S2G Investments, Fifty Years, VamosVentures
Founders: Jim Flatt, Lee Chae, Sofia Elizondo
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Biotechnology, Data and Analytics, Food and Beverage, Health Care, Science and Engineering, Software
Full Description: Brightseed is a pioneer in biosciences and artificial intelligence that illuminates nature to restore human health. Through Forager® A.I. and clinical evaluation, Brightseed helps companies gain the deepest insight into bioactives and their innovation potential. Forager A.I. accelerates bioactive discovery and biological validation from years to months – and is rapidly revealing new connections between nature and humanity. Brightseed partners with companies across the consumer health continuum to provide novel insights and science-backed health solutions.  Bioactives are small molecule compounds produced by plants, fungi, and microbes that grow in and adapt to environments that present a wide range of challenges to their survival. Bioactives also benefit the health of humans – they are the enlivening caffeine in tea, the powerful antioxidant lycopene in tomatoes, and they inform active ingredients in medicines like Taxol, Aspirin, and Metformin, a first-line treatment for Type 2 diabetes, derived from the French lilac flower. Science has long known that bioactives are critical to human health, yet the vast majority remain unknown and uncharted. Brightseed’s A.I., Forager®, discovers bioactives in nature and maps them to human health outcomes at a rate and accuracy that was previously impossible.

Top 5 Investors: Edge Case Capital Partners, Tech Coast Angels Los Angeles, Alla Aizenberg, Michael Cooney, MD, Fred Doan
Founders: Eric Navarrette, Jocelyn Hsu Amador, Leon Hui, Rene Amador, William Hellwarth
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Commerce and Shopping, Data and Analytics, Hardware, Media and Entertainment, Professional Services, Science and Engineering, Software, Video
Full Description: ARwall provides AI & XR content production solutions that are simple, fast, and affordable. We're building studio-quality virtual production tools for 500 million creators  on desktop and mobile, with a scalable platform and ecosystem model utilizing SaaS, multi-tier subscription, digital product sales, and ecommerce. We started almost 10 years ago as a prestige tech consultancy that patented and has top domain expertise on an alternative to green screen VFX called In-Camera XR Virtual Production or LED Volumes. Our patented invention, ARFX, combines mixed reality, augmented reality, and genAI environments with multi-user support so a team can split the roles of running a production on an LED volume, or alternatively a single creator can shoot and control a complete project in their living room using their smartphone and 4KTV nearly by themselves. It's this extreme level of flexibility and power that changes the paradigm for creators. Our new method is highly automated, and unlike prior tools built for technicians, ours is built for content creators to use directly.​ 8 years ago, we were the first movers in this tech with a mission to free it from the Hollywood labs. We succeeded, first by patenting and bringing to market XR SYNC our foundational 1-click calibration method, and our startup exceeded all expectations. We've shipped 16 software titles, have been awarded 5 patents with 2 more pending, deployed over 150 in-camera XR filmmaking systems; and won an Emmy, Product of the Year awards, and now developed a ground-breaking AI/XR hybrid ecosystem that represents the future of content production for both professional shoots and the creator economy.​ In 2024 and 2025, ARwall won the AI Product of the Year from the National Association of Broadcasters (the trade group composed of TV leadership) two years in a row, becoming the first company to ever do so.

Industries: Information Technology, Natural Language Processing, Software, Video
Description: StoryFile is an information technology company that develops storytelling application to distribute stories and voices globally.
Top 5 Investors: Synetro Group, The Seed Lab
Founders: Ceci Chan, Heather Smith, Sam Gustman, Stephen Smith
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Information Technology, Media and Entertainment, Software, Video
Full Description: StoryFile is changing the way people interact and communicate with each other and the world. Through user-led voice-activated technology, advanced AI and beyond, StoryFile provides a platform for an intimate and natural conversational video interactive experience. StoryFile is a content-driven technology company that allows individuals to preserve, share, and consume stories and experiences through its proprietary and innovative legacy capture system.   StoryFile is reimagining storytelling by authentically preserving memories, moments, and beyond, in a meaningful way that empowers the storyteller and user. By preserving stories and history in a way that allows users to have authentic interactions, StoryFile is not only creating a new form of storytelling, but is also creating more sustainable bonds between people, everywhere.   Creating a world where everyone, anywhere, anytime, can connect with those living or in the past is finally a reality with StoryFile.  This visual and interactive storytelling platform allows people to have a natural conversation across time and space.   Just think – StoryFile gives your great-great grandchildren an opportunity to speak with you, learn from you, and get to know you in a way that was never possible before. The gift of storytelling – the gift of passing experiences to future generations – is priceless. StoryFile wants to ensure each and every person has such opportunity – from the Studio experience to the app, there is something for everyone!   Here’s how it works: An individual is filmed (or films themselves) answering questions about their life, which are then processed and stored on the StoryFile platform. Users can then have a real life-like conversation with the filmed-version of the individual on the web or mobile application – anytime, anywhere. StoryFile’s platform promotes user-led education and curiosity, providing an opportunity for users to directly engage with the interviewee. StoryFile captures the interviewee’s legacy in a unique way by empowering the interviewee to pass on their values, struggles, life lessons, morals, decisions and more, while inspiring future generations.   About The StoryFile Experience: The StoryFile experience is intimate, personal and truly unique. StoryFile has created a warm and comfortable studio space for the interviewee to share his/her life lessons, personal memories, struggles, triumphs, joys, milestones, and more. The most important thing about you is your story, so it’s the most important story to tell. StoryFile’s team takes the time to get to know you, and works with you and your family to craft and facilitate the telling of that story, as it is the most important gift to future generations you will ever give. StoryFile’s studio is equipped with cutting edge technology that produces 3D assets as well as Hi-Fidelity 2D images. This is how the magic is made.

Industries: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Bioinformatics, Clinical Trials, Life Science
Description: Unlearn.AI combines AI, digital twins, and novel statistical methods to enable smaller, more efficient clinical trials.
Top 5 Investors: Alumni Ventures, Insight Partners, 8VC, Radical Ventures, DCVC
Founders: Aaron Smith, Charles Fisher, Graham Siegel, Jonathan Walsh
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Biotechnology, Data and Analytics, Health Care, Science and Engineering, Software
Full Description: Unlearn.AI is a biotech AI company that develops a digital twin service for clinical trials. Digital twins enhance healthcare by assessing health risks before a disease manifests its symptoms, according to some experts.  Unlearn brings together a world-class team of experts across pharma, medtech, machine learning, and business who share a vision of using machine learning and biostatistics to improve clinical trials for the benefit of patients and sponsors. Unlearn invented their TwinRCT solution to enable biopharma partners to run faster, more successful clinical trials. A TwinRCT is a randomized trial that uses machine learning to achieve a higher probability of success with a smaller number of patients. As in a traditional RCT, patients are randomized to a treatment group and a control group, but, unlike a traditional trial, a prognostic digital twin is created for every patient using a machine learning model trained on historical data. The treatment effects for the primary and secondary outcomes can all be estimated from the trial with greater precision after correcting for a prognostic score derived for each patient's digital twin. TwinRCTs provide a scientifically-sound method for using deep learning and historical patient data to improve clinical trials.

Still, it has remained inaccessible due to its vast complexity. InterVenn has pioneered a first-of-its-kind AI-powered platform to decode this layer of biology at a clinically meaningful scale for the first time in history. Founded by Nobel Laureate Dr. Carolyn Bertozzi, world-class scientist and distinguished professor Dr. Carlito Lebrilla and leading AI/ML expert & serial entrepreneur Aldo Carrascoso, InterVenn will contribute to making the new era of personalized, predictive, and preventative care a reality. Full Description: Whisker Labs develops cutting-edge sensor technology to protect families, homes, and communities by predicting and preventing electrical fires in homes while monitoring the resiliency and safety of the U.S. electrical grid. Its flagship solution, Ting, draws on decades of electromagnetic and atmospheric sensor expertise combined with AI to detect electrical faults in the home and across the grid. Through a single DIY sensor plugged into a wall outlet inside the home, Ting enables intelligent detection, localization, and mitigation of hazards before they can start a fire. Ting is proven to prevent four out of five home electrical fires, reducing home fire losses and saving lives across the U.S. daily. As one of the fastest-growing grid IoT networks - with 3/4 million homes protected today and 50k homes joining the service monthly - the Ting Sensor Network has evolved into a vital data source supporting grid resiliency. Industry Groups: Biotechnology, Data and Analytics, Health Care, Science and Engineering
Full Description: Polaris Genomics is mapping molecular biomarkers to chart a new course for objective mental health diagnostics and novel therapeutics.  Polaris Genomics identifies genomic biomarkers to support the development of psychiatric drugs and clinical tools. The company's genomics-based ADAPT Platform™ curates information on biologically-relevant gene network pathways indicated in neuropsychiatric conditions — including anxiety, depression, alcohol/substance use disorder, ADHD, PTSD, and TBI (ADAPT). The ADAPT Platform™ comprises: 1. targeted neuropsychiatric gene panel, which contains  1000+ transcriptomic biomarkers related to known system pathways in neuropsychiatric  conditions; 2. deep analytics (AI/ML) engine; and 3. expanding data lake and sample repository. ADAPT has identified transcriptomic biomarkers for PTSD, resulting in the first-of-its-kind clinical blood test for PTSD screening, Polaris' PTS-ID™.

Full Description: Finch Therapeutics is a mission-driven microbiome engineering company, is developing novel microbial therapies to serve patients with serious and unmet medical needs.  The company uses machine learning algorithms to reverse engineer successful fecal transplantations and other clinical datasets, identifying the microbes that drive responses in patients. This human-centric discovery model leverages clinical data to focus on in-vitro and in-vivo efforts on cocktails of microbes that have already demonstrated safety and efficacy in humans. This enables early retirement of translational risk and avoids the challenges of extrapolating host-specific effects from animal models. Finch Therapeutics was founded in 2017 and is headquartered in Somerville, Massachusetts.

Full Description: "Optimized today, Autonomous Tomorrow” Quartic.ai places the power of AI directly in the hands of plant subject matter experts (SMEs) with their complete Smart Industry platform for process manufacturing industries implementing digital transformation with AI and IIoT.  Quartic.ai allows manufacturers to extract more value from legacy infrastructure and build Industry 4.0 factories. Quartic.ai enables plant SMEs to create and deploy AI applications to significantly increase productivity and operational performance.  Quartic.ai was founded by a veteran team of process manufacturing and reliability experts, in conjunction with data scientists to make AI deployment easy, to integrate seamlessly with OT systems, and to provide distributed learning at the Edge, Fog and in the cloud. Learn more at www.quartic.ai As veterans of process automation and control, our founders know that the success of industrial digital transformation is in the hands of those who spend each day designing, operating, and maintaining your equipment – your subject matter experts. The Quartic Platform provides human-in-the-loop augmented intelligence for Smart Industry. With our intelligence engine, eXponence™, we put the power of AI in the hands of your subject matter experts. SME’s can build AI solutions with zero code or script writing. Contextual data, the voice of your machines, is the source of all intelligence. While you have the data from many sources, without context, the intelligence remains stranded. With illuminator™, our IIoT data engine, a modern OT data lake, and pipeline, we create dynamic context, so the SME can focus on creating valuable intelligence with eXponence™.  Advanced users and data scientists who prefer to use machine learning and deep learning libraries and programming language of their choice can simply connect with Illuminator™ and use the abstract industrial data types to speed up deployment without doing any data integration. These 3rd party applications can connect with Illuminator™ using Kafka Pub/Sub, Quartic SDK, or API. With an employee first, work hard – play hard culture, every member of the Quartic.ai team contributes their creativity, passion, and pride to collaborate with our customers and build valuable AI for their business. Our organization is structured on ideas, not hierarchies.

Top 5 Investors: Google for Startups, Yamaha Motor Ventures, Creative Destruction Lab (CDL), Motus Ventures, ANIMO Ventures
Founders: Florian Pestoni, Julian Cerruti, Mario Munich
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Hardware, Information Technology, Internet Services, Science and Engineering, Software
Full Description: InOrbit is bridging the autonomy gap through a cloud robot management platform that enables robotics companies and operators to develop, deploy and orchestrate autonomous robots at global scale. The commercial service robot market, is growing over 40% YoY and is expected to hit $50B by 2024. InOrbit is pioneering the new field of RobOps, or DevOps for Robotics -- think of it as Splunk/Datadog for Robots. InOrbit’s multi-cloud platform provides secure, real-time analytics and data collection, robot performance monitoring (RPM), incident management and remote interventions. The company’s proprietary technology, including adaptive diagnostics and predictive analytics, is able to derive unique value by leveraging industry-wide data that provides InOrbit’s customer’s insight they are unable to obtain on their own.  InOrbit has access to over 300 Petabytes of data per month and can learn faster than any robotics company by operating across different robots and industry verticals. Customers and partners include Google, Qualcomm, Sprint, Brain Corp., Bossa Nova Robotics and over a dozen other robot manufacturers that range from early stage to scaling.  InOrbit’s founding team includes Mario Munich, a pioneer in robotics and former SVP Technology at iRobot (through acquisition of Evolution Robotics, where he was CTO); Julian Cerruti, an expert in complex systems, robotics and augmented reality (experience with Willow Garage, creator of de facto standard Robot Operating System, Savioke, Clearpath, Google, IBM); and Florian Pestoni, with experience leading product teams reaching hundreds of millions of users at large-scale cloud companies (formerly at Microsoft, Adobe, Atlassian, Facebook, Ooyala). Together the team holds well over 50 patents in security, autonomous navigation, image processing, distributed systems and collaboration, with diverse experience including starting companies, scaling teams, shipping products at scale and achieving venture-backed exit through acquisition.

Full Description: Beomni AI, developed by Beyond Imagination, is a next-generation AI brain designed to power humanoid robots and other advanced robotic systems. Modeled after the way the human brain learns, Beomni AI acquires skills progressively—starting with individual tasks and advancing toward full professional capabilities across multiple domains. Our technology is built around specialized, lightweight AI models (“Expert Minds”) that operate locally and offline, enabling robots to perform complex tasks without relying on constant cloud connectivity. Through our Hive Mind architecture, every Beomni-powered robot contributes to a shared learning network—accelerating collective intelligence across the fleet. At the core of our ecosystem is the Beomni Synthetic Brain, a proprietary AI platform that functions as a universal operating system for humanoid robotics. It enables seamless task learning, real-world adaptation, and secure, scalable deployment. We’re redefining the future of physical labor—enabling intelligent machines to learn, adapt, and work alongside humans across industries.

Full Description: BioXcel Therapeutics is a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company focused on drug development that utilizes novel artificial intelligence (AI) to identify the next wave of medicines across neuroscience and immuno-oncology. Its drug re-innovation approach leverages existing approved drugs and/or clinically validated product candidates together with big data and proprietary machine learning algorithms to identify new therapeutic indices.  They believe that this differentiated approach has the potential to reduce the cost and time of drug development in diseases with substantial unmet medical needs. BXCL501 is a sublingual thin film formulation of the a2a adrenergic receptor agonist dexmedetomidine, or Dex, for acute treatment of agitation resulting from neurological and psychiatric disorders. It intends to utilize the 505(b)(2) pathway for BXCL501, initiated a Phase 1b safety study using the IV formulation of Dex in mild probable Alzheimer's Disease in December 2017, and plans to do the same for schizophrenia patients in the 1H18, with data expected in the 2H18. BXCL701 (formerly Talabostat) is an immuno-oncology agent for the treatment of a rare form of prostate cancer and pancreatic cancer.

Industries: Apps, Artificial Intelligence (AI), B2B, Content Creators, Generative AI, Music, Music Streaming
Description: Mubert is an AI-powered platform that allows its users to create soundtracks and music, and also connects musicians and listeners.
Top 5 Investors: AltaIR Capital, IT-Farm, LVL1 Group, FunCubator, GVA Capital
Industry Groups: Apps, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Internet Services, Media and Entertainment, Music and Audio, Other, Science and Engineering, Software
Full Description: Mubert is a music licensing platform made for streamers, app builders, filmmakers and content creators around the world. We use millions of high-quality music samples to generate and deliver exclusive, royalty-free music using the power of AI. With a near-endless music library featuring more than 100 musical categories, users can search by genre, mood and activity to find the perfect song for their project. Mubert, a platform trusted by thousands of content creators and companies like Banuba, BetterMe, Sensorium, Adidas, InsightTimer, Restream, MacPaw and Crello, can help you find the music you need. Democratization of Creator Economy Our one-of-a-kind creator-centric platform utilizes AI to generate unlimited royalty-free music. Users can generate tracks on the go or search through a massive database of pre-made tracks to create highly personalized content. With a variety of license types, dynamic presets for streaming and over 1 million samples from more than 4,000 musicians, it is one of the most powerful and versatile music licensing platforms around. Stand Out From The Crowd – Music For Content Creators Content creators often struggle with sifting through thousands of stock audio tracks in search of the “perfect soundtrack.” Unfortunately, stock music never quite fits. Using YouTube tune library can be just as fruitless for the unique content creator, as many of these tracks have been used by millions of creators before. With Mubert, content creators gain access to real-time generative music and pre-made tracks, which they may Render with the genre, mood and length, allowing for more customization than ever before. The platform has more than 100 genres and a large selection of attributes, such as mood, tempo and genre, to help creators find the right music for their project fast. App creators enjoy the adaptive nature of Mubert’s music, which helps increase the in-app and in-game user experience. From casual Twitch and Youtube Streamers to app-building gurus, the platform provides unique, custom-made music with a single subscription. Music Without Strikes or Copyright Infringements Fears of copyright/DMCA claims and strikes can hinder a content creator’s ability to work freely. One mistake and hours of work could be tossed down the drain due to unexpected or unpredictable platform algorithms. People often end up dealing with stock websites that don’t have the correct license, websites with inaccurate license descriptions, licenses that don’t cover the necessary content, or licenses that aren’t available in all countries. When content creators use Mubert, they never have to worry about music licensing or confusing royalty agreements. The beauty of Mubert is that all of the music on our platform is royalty-free and available for use worldwide. Our licenses and sub-licenses are 100% DMCA-friendly and compatible with a number of platforms, i.e., YouTube, Twitch, Facebook and more. Plus, when you license music through Mubert, you get support from licensing professionals who can help you with any questions you might have! Empowering Artists With nominal commissions, hungry publishing companies and an unstable industry, artists often find it difficult to diversify their income. Here at Mubert, we understand the importance of artists, musicians and producers, which is why we collaborate with them using unique frameworks so that they can monetize their music. When artists work with Mubert, they receive a platform on which they can express themselves and earn real money on their work. When a content creator licenses music from Mubert, they are licensing high-quality, pro-level audio material made with the involvement of independent music producers. Ready to dive into the next-gen musical landscape and be a part of one of the most innovative music creation and licensing platforms around? Come join us.

Description: MicroByre is a biotechnology company that specializes in microbiology, synthetic biology, molecular biology, and machine learning..
Top 5 Investors: Lowercarbon Capital, Safar Partners, The House Fund, Azolla Ventures, Activate
Founders: Jeff Anderson, Margaret Brown, Sarah Richardson
Industry Groups: Biotechnology, Data and Analytics, Health Care, Science and Engineering
Full Description: MicroByre is a platform for bacterial domestication. Their automated characterization pipeline gathers the oft-overlooked data that highlights unleveraged bacteria that meet functional industrial criteria. That is, they rapidly find the bacteria with naturally unfussy eating habits and evolution-honed metabolisms that have the potential to convert unrefined biomasses into commodity chemicals at vastly improved efficiencies compared to extant fermentation processes. They select from these functionally de-risked bacteria those which can be directly genetically modified to improve their cost profiles — even if they have never been engineered before. The data from our unique characterization pipeline informs the minimally precise genetic modifications necessary to increase pliability and yield, eliminate nutritional additives, maximize feedstock utilization, and improve contamination tolerance & phage resistance. MicroByre gives biomass conversion a truly competitive edge against petrochemical synthesis. 				 MicroByre’s platform bridges the gap between the promising and the profitable in synthetic biology and bioengineering. A unique combination of resources and skills makes MicroByre a valuable potential partner for companies of all sizes and industries. They collaborate to define project scope to match a mutually agreeable business model, which could be a fee for service, license agreement, or joint development agreement.

Industries: Analytics, Information Technology, Internet, Internet of Things, Predictive Analytics, Software
Description: Simetric is a software company providing real-time insights across carriers for the global scale of connected devices.
Top 5 Investors: Ocean Azul Partners, Ross Brown
Founders: Allen Boone, Andrew Brimer, Robert Bruckner, Ted Walters
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Information Technology, Internet Services, Software
Full Description: Simetric, the next-generation insights and management platform for your IoT ecosystem. It’s time to take control of IoT.   In 2017, the Simetric team recognized an underlying need in the IoT industry- the lack of fundamental support and expertise in IoT cellular connectivity management. The existing connectivity platforms deployed by operators were built with a proprietary focus, impeding any company’s ability to manage their IoT instances across operators effectively. With the initial focus of many IoT efforts being largely automation, the limitations of competing IoT platforms were not fully recognized.  At the forefront of Simetric’s original vision was the customer.  We created a new platform that encompassed a unified management pane that established for a company - of any size and any type - the tools to centrally manage all connectivity needs in a Single Pane of Glass.  In 2019, the company looked at what the next phase of IoT could become to unify connectivity and device performance to enable companies to not only unify non-conforming IoT platforms but also to move IoT business process execution to the device effortlessly across all the operators’ IoT platforms.  We then enlisted proven executives from Microsoft, Cisco, and Verizon to further accelerate our thought leadership that unified the strengths of the cloud with the network and efforts of operators.    With the global IoT market scaling into billions of cellular connections and the next horizon of needs driven heavily by 5G and autonomous driving, companies will need an IoT platform that is highly extensible and analytical for them to evolve their businesses with these technology advancements.  Simetric’s comprehensive ability to unify connectivity and device management is quickly being positioned at the forefront of modern IoT efforts, positioning them to take advantage of 5G.

Full Description: NextStep Robotics provides clinics the ability to offer personalized robotic therapy to patients through adaptive software that provides a personalized assist as needed approach. As they collect more data, the software will transition into an AI-based system to assess and assigns training protocols optimized for each patient’s deficit. The improved outcomes will allow clinics to provide reimbursable therapy using existing CPT codes for gait training on a patient base they currently have no treatment for. Industries: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Gaming, Metaverse, SaaS, Software
Headquarters Location: New York, New York, United States
Description: MetaSoul INC, an American Delaware company headquartered in New York, specializes in Emotion Synthesis for generative AI models.
Top 5 Investors: Ascend Venture Capital, Quake Capital Partners, New Age Ventures, PAN Group Australia, Kathryn Stewart
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Gaming, Media and Entertainment, Science and Engineering, Software
Full Description: MetaSoul INC, an American Delaware company (January 2017) headquartered in New York, specializes in Emotion Synthesis for generative AI models. Our prediction is that by the end of this century, humans will engage in more conversations with sentient digital entities (AI) than with other humans. However, the current emotional technology fails to fulfill the fundamental human need for emotions. This is precisely where MetaSoul steps in to provide a solution. With fields as diverse as AI, metaverse, gaming, healthcare, and automotive, emotion synthesis is the ultimate upgrade for any product or service. In addition, the growing presence of AI, gaming, and virtual reality in society shows how critical and meaningful emotional interaction is to remove the barrier to widespread adoption. What sets EPU apart in the industry is that we're capable of generating any emotional state in an AI (LLM) from multimodal stimuli through wave computing. We also allow the AI to emotionally understand a situation by emotional reasoning and make a decision. Each unique MetaSoul (Persona) is linked to an EPUID to progress the development of its emotional personality over time, thanks to deep machine learning. MetaSoul’s breakthrough AI in advanced emotion synthesis dynamically layers emotion and empathy into any voice application and automated responses without the need for additional coding. Emotion synthesis technology not only controls voices but can also control the different facial micro expressions (FACS) and body languages of digital humans, robots, avatars, or NPC’s.’ faces in real-time using FACS What Make Us Unique MetaSoul holds a foundational patent family, granted by the United States Patent and Trademark Office, for perceiving and computing emotions in artificial intelligence (AI). Today, major tech companies in the US are using MetaSoul's technology when they deploy language and learning models (LLMs), as well as synthetic voices that can express dynamic tones, and life like avatars. As a result, MetaSoul has garnered significant attention.” Most of the AI research and innovation in this area has focused on detecting the emotional state by machine. Our unique, technology goes the next step by using AI to shape the machine’s cognitive appraisal and response, especially where voice and facial applications are involved. As a result, we are transforming the capabilities of Robots and AI, creating emotional states and synthetic emotion in for generative AI models. EPU is the industry’s first virtual emotion synthesis engine that delivers high performance machine emotion awareness. The EPU III family is transforming the capabilities of Robots and AI. MetaSoul has completed the deployment of the first EPU (emotional processing unit) in the cloud, a technology that creates emotional states and synthetic emotion in intelligent machines. The EPU is based on Patrick Levy-Rosenthal’s Psychobiotic Evolutionary Theory, extending Ekman’s theory by using twelve primary emotions identified in the psycho-evolutionary theory and pain/pleasure and frustration/satisfaction. Our revolutionary algorithms enable machines to respond to stimuli in line with one of the twelve primary emotions: anger, fear, sadness, disgust, indifference, regret, surprise, inattention, trust, confidence, desire, and joy. The Emotion recognition classifiers achieve more than 83 percent accuracy (ISEAR) on the conversation. The most innovative aspect of MetaSoul’ s emotion synthesis breakthrough is its real-time appraisal computation with reinforcement learning and Emotion Profile Graph (EPG) computation functionality allowing the AI or robot to experience 64 trillion possible distinct emotional states. Emotional stimuli are stored within the memory bank with their associated cognitive and physical state. The vEPU III has developed an EPG, which is used to register and develop over time a bank of emotional associations for each memory data within each intelligent machine. The EPG can communicate the data to other AI technologies to achieve a realistic range of expressions and interactions designed specifically for the user. The data allows the AI technologies to virtually understand/get to know the user and elicit the same emotional response. This technology allows an AI, robotic toy, or IoT device to develop a unique MBTI personality and emotion sensitivity (MetaSoul®) based on its user interactions and memories which will ultimately mean that no two have the exact same. Our emotion machine-learning cloud platform working with the EPU is built on years of research protected under issued patents for Special purpose processors (GPU). It becomes more emotionally intelligent with each interaction through symbolic reinforcement learning. In the near future, generative AI is poised to revolutionize the film industry by creating entire movies, going beyond just generating images or text. The demand for generative AI to produce synthetic emotions through character facial expressions, body language, and tone of voice, based on a deep understanding of the script and visual elements, will take center stage. MetaSoul, as the architect of emotion synthesis for AI, stands as the sole provider capable of offering a comprehensive solution in this domain.

Full Description: The advantages offered by modern GPU computing are fully realized with BroadBridge Networks’ entirely redesigned cybersecurity analytics stack, which incorporates breakthrough advances in network transport, disk IO, memory frameworks, and accelerated AI data science libraries. By aggregating all network intelligence into a common, in memory data format, a comprehensive view of the attack surface can be visualized in milliseconds, or retrieved from a forensic archive without further need to temporally align data, or synchronize logs across input systems. Innovations: • Sensor to core: A revolutionary “on-the-wire” data representation that does not require deserialization on receipt.  Anticipating future requirements, we support parallel transfers, allowing data to be streamed to or from a cluster of servers simultaneously. • Aggressive storage to GPU acceleration: Innovative IO optimization technologies open a direct data path between GPU memory and storage, avoiding the CPU altogether. This increases bandwidth, decreases latency, and decreases utilization load on the CPU and GPU, offering performance gains of competitive technologies of 50-200x.

Description: Music Tech Company Building Web3 AI Music Platform & Interactive Music Offers For The Metaverse
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Blockchain and Cryptocurrency, Data and Analytics, Internet Services, Media and Entertainment, Music and Audio, Other, Science and Engineering, Software
Full Description: DigiTraxAI is a music technology company that utilizes proprietary artificial intelligence to develop new ways of creating and experiencing music. The company has developed a patented generative AI process that leverages evolutionary algorithms trained on music theory as the key innovation of the KR38R (Cre-a-tor) platform, unlike other music AI technologies, our platform does not rely upon sampling existing copyrighted compositions/sound recordings. The platform API connectivity leverages the company's AI patents and Music Catalog for Voice Modeling and for new music creation to assist consumers, artists, and music labels in unlocking additional value from existing music content and new music development, including the creation of new songs/recordings based on artist’s cognizable “motifs”.  *DigiTrax AI is currently participating in the NVIDIA Inception (NASDAQ: NVDA) and Intel (NASDAQ: INTC) AI Partner Programs. -> 7 granted patents uniquely grounded in music theory AI data block analysis and composition. -> 18,000 hit song music catalog (all genres 1920-2024) multitrack recordings perfect for AI training models, games/film licensing, etc., a $9 million catalog value. -> Licensing agreements with all the major music publishers for mechanical and video synchronization rights.  -> We have created an AI music license based on an artist’s “Motif" a process that takes into account the proven compositional and performance patterns that have resulted in the       artist's past success, that can help to replicate the same going forward. -> Produced an album for a Major Record Labels, Platinum recording Artist with our KR38R Pro Artist Lab Services division for release in 2024. -> Maintain a Label Services agreement with AIMPED for AI production of 12 Artists to include well-known legacy recording artists utilizing our KR38R Pro Lab Services division. -> Promoting the KR38R launch through our w/ NVIDIA and INTEL AI Investments Programs in early 2024. -> Initial marketing efforts will be addressing a $40 Billion Market -> We have an agreement with a major NASDAQ Investment Bank for a 2024 transaction. Patented Music Technology for Artificial Intelligence, Streaming Platforms, NFTs, Short-Form Video, and the Metaverse.DigiTrax Entertainment Inc., a Music Technology Company has two divisions: a patented Artificial Intelligence music lab, and award-winning recording studios specializing in sound-alike music serving the $7.9 billion karaoke and entertainment marketplace. DigiTrax distributes its Artificial Intelligence (AI) and sound-alike music products for karaoke, apps, games, TV, film, streaming and animation markets globally. The Company is equipped with an experienced management team, state-of-art music/video studios, a proprietary 18,000+ song music catalog, a streaming media technology platform and AI music creation patents, and has developed a suite of apps in the music creation and karaoke industry that will give it the ability to become a worldwide leader and service provider in the entertainment industry over the next five years. Company Formation April 2017 DigiTrax Entertainment, Inc. was incorporated under the laws of the State of Florida in April 2017. Since its incorporation, the Company has focused substantially all of its time and resources on activities relating to capital raising, content development, app development, and the acquisition of all or substantially all of the assets of each of the following three (3) entities; (i) DigiTrax Entertainment, LLC (“DigiTrax”), a streaming media company that created high-quality, sought-after interactive music and artificial intelligence for apps, video, karaoke, games, TV, film, and animation with approximately $1M of unaudited revenues for the year ending 2019, with assets generally consisting of a recording studio and multimedia equipment, (ii) World Wide Digital Entertainment, LLC, whose assets generally consisted of an 11,000+ song Master Music Catalog, and (iii) Exomens, LTD (UK), a European-based Artificial Intelligence (AI) software company specializing in music creation, whose assets generally consisted of seven (7) patents and/or patents pending relating to its AI Software. Company Technology Today January 2024 The Company produces and distributes high-quality digital, interactive karaoke music from its proprietary 18,000+ song music catalog which has an asset value of $9 + million.  The Company’s digital streaming delivery platform, the Karaoke Cloud, Karaoke Cloud API, and Karaoke On Demand are able to deliver the Company’s proprietary 18,000+ karaoke song library, presently delivering songs to consumers and professional karaoke DJ customers around the world.  The Karaoke Cloud digital platform has the capability to deliver streaming karaoke music-video to apps on iPhones, iPads, Apple TV, Roku, Fire TV, and Android smartphones and tablets, as well as to desktop computers on major browser platforms.  Additionally, the Company has created its first AI user interfaces, the KR38R app, and KR38R Pro DAW (Digital Audio Workstation) plug-in. Both user interfaces integrate our Artificial Intelligence (AI) brain, The Music Builder. The Company believes that its KR38R Pro plug-in software and the KR38R app will disrupt and transform the music production industry. There are over 100 million DAWs in use worldwide and over 1.6 billion phone users who create and post short-form videos and need music. We are providing AI-produced Hip-Hop and Pop music which accounts for over 40% of the music market. Presently 600 million hours of short-form video are viewed daily. When broken down into 15-second clips, this represents over 24 Billion videos daily, all of which need music. We believe our KR38R app will dominate in the market. KR38R VOICE brings generative AI technology to music production, allowing users to create a model that is a digital copy of their own voice. Users can then use their voice model to sing songs from a catalog of licensed hit music without singing a word.   KR38R VOICE is built for singing voice conversion.  This deep learning process requires the computer to create a model based on learning how a person pronounces phonemes, syllables, and words.  At a high level, the input audio is broken down into frequency bands so the computer can analyze the distinct characteristics which make up a person’s voice, such as raspiness and breathiness. The resulting model is then optimized for direct pitch-to-pitch conversion where the desired output voice will sing the same notes and words as the input voice.  The KR38R VOICE offers all the chart-topping tunes to put your voice model on, currently offering the top ten TikTok hit songs to rearrange and remix with the power of AI. [Important Note: We only offer licensed music.] KR38R  VOICE is available at https://www.kr38r.com/voice Summary Over the past six years, the Company has produced interactive music videos for karaoke and play-along, built an Apple TV and iOS app for KaraokeOnDemand, Karaoke Cloud, and Karaoke Cloud Pro - a subscription service for professional DJs and karaoke hosts, and an award-winning YouTube Channel with over 80 thousand subscribers. We record exclusively for the Fender Guitar app, and we record for Yamaha Disklavier player pianos. The Company has been granted seven (7) AI-based patents, and developed the Music Builder Brain, the Music Fact Reports - a comparative copyright analysis platform, and the soon-to-be-released KR38R app and the KR38R Pro DAW plugin which the Company believes will dominate the short-form video arena, and disrupt and transform music forever.  The Company believes the  KR38R PRO  app will be a  major force in generating revenue for the music industry and become the standard for the way music is created, produced, and enjoyed.

Full Description: Canopy uses on-device machine learning to discover sights, sounds, and stories to inspire your life. The company is taking a new approach to personalized discovery. One that doesn’t require knowing every action you take or every preference you have. Your personal data stays on your phone, in your hands. Canopy doesn’t see your personal information or track your behavior. The company's app looks at things you like—songs you’ve played, places you’ve explored, articles you’ve read and loved—and makes a summary of your tastes. This vector can’t be reverse engineered to identify you or your personal preferences. Most importantly, nothing but this unidentifiable summary leaves your phone. Canopy uses this anonymized summary, along with other anonymized summaries, as a roadmap to find content you’ll enjoy. We then share these picks back to you in your app each day.

Description: Rebuilding healthcare on an open & transparent marketplace

Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Biotechnology, Blockchain and Cryptocurrency, Commerce and Shopping, Data and Analytics, Financial Services, Health Care, Other, Payments, Software
Full Description: Citizen Health is a public benefit company rebuilding healthcare for the next generation. We're fueled by a passionate community from around the world who believe healthcare could and should be better. The opportunity Citizen Health seizes is the growing trend towards free market medicine, the rise of Direct Patient Care, and the frustration people face from confusing medical bills. Utilizing the latest advances in blockchain technologies, wearables, and machine learning, the company is solving core problems to reinvent the way healthcare services are offered and purchased.  Our core developments: 1. Humantiv, a health operating system designed to optimize health & wellness by incentivizing people to pursue healthy lifestyles through behavioral cryptoeconomics. 2. Medoplex, an open & transparent marketplace where healthcare buyers & sellers transact directly in a free market economy without insurance intermediaries. 3. Personalized Health Assurance, a decentralized health sharing network that includes memberships, subscriptions, and catastrophic insurance plan alternatives. Built by a team of startup founders, PhD researchers, doctors, and experienced hospital/insurance executives, Citizen Health is connecting vast networks of people who understand both sides of the healthcare equation and have the experience to bring fundamental innovation to the complex medical system. Come join us on this mission!

Description: HealthMode delivers AI-enabled digital measurement methods to increase the precision and speed of clinical research, and improve healthcare.

Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Health Care, Information Technology, Science and Engineering, Software
Full Description: HealthMode delivers AI-enabled digital measurement methods to increase the precision and speed of clinical research, and improve healthcare. HealthMode drives progression to next-generation clinical trials by developing and delivering AI-enabled digital measurement methods for clinical trials. Its client partners represent a diverse set of stakeholders, from clinical researchers and drug developers at large pharmaceutical companies, to academic medical centers, to startups entering the space. HealthMode's measurement techniques improve understanding of phenotype; streamline and provide assurance for screening and eligibility; provide early detection and mitigation of adverse events; and serve as a sensitive, specific, objective, and low participant burden efficacy endpoints. These measurements allow for meaningful integration of clinical trial data with real-world evidence and provide the basis for movement toward patient-specific measures. Better measurement tools and the platforms to support them help HealthMode's partners make data-informed decisions, reduce uncertainty around enrollment and outcomes, de-risk development, and increase the speed at which novel therapeutics reach patients in need.

Full Description: Clickdate is an online intelligent matchmaking platform that empowers users to  EASILY find an IDEAL partner. It intuitively guides even too-shy-to-talk users on steps to be taken for scheduling a perfect date directly from the app.  ClickDate is here to revolutionize the search for love. We have designed our entire approach to improve the chances of finding love. Traditionally, dating sites have their members answer a series of questions or trying to match people with other social similarities. Their responses are then used as a basis for who the person is, what his/her likes are, and who they should be paired with. At ClickDate, we look beyond what users say they want, we are looking deep into a person's subconscious, and analyzing what the person's heart and brain looking for.  By combining AI with behaviorism - a modern psychological approach that holds that the study of a person’s behavior, we reach the best result.   We are not looking for partners who are 100 percent similar to us. We are looking for love, for positive differences and traits that complement our own. The purpose of a relationship is to complement each other. ClickDate is more than a dating site. ClickDate is a matchmaker. We do not want to get two people to just date. We connect two people who match and can love each other.

Industries: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Cryptocurrency, Digital Media, Machine Learning, Mobile Payments, Natural Language Processing, Social Impact, Social Media, Social Network, Software
Description: The first proactive AI assistant that sits at the epicentre of AI and daily life
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Blockchain and Cryptocurrency, Data and Analytics, Financial Services, Internet Services, Media and Entertainment, Mobile, Other, Payments, Science and Engineering, Social Impact, Software
Full Description: Other Mind is the first proactive AI assistant that sits at the epicentre of AI and daily life. It uses proprietary learning models designed and developed by some of the industry’s leading data scientists, to disrupt how technology supports daily life. Other Mind is creating a new and innovative kind of Artificial Intelligence (AI) based assistant that actively listens and learns the things you do, before proactively taking care of them for you. In addition it is innovating new and intuitive ways to connect you with the world, while aggregating the majority of features and functionalities seen in other social media, chat, and currency transfer applications. Our world is getting flatter and the number of apps and feeds you need to manage to keep up with society, is becoming overwhelming to say the least. Founded in Los Angeles, CA in 2017, Other Mind is designed to free users from the constant focus on digital devices, using the full capabilities of AI and machine learning to execute mundane tasks while keeping the user engaged. It is changing how people leverage technology and is giving users back time, freedom and independence from the struggle of maintaining an ever-growing digital presence, while staying completely connected.  Other Mind is an alternative technology company that is 100% subscription-based and does not rely on third party data monetization or other forms of advertising or data-mining tools. Because of this, each user can be assured that their information and data will never leave the platform and will only be used to the benefit of each user independently.

Full Description: The only way to develop leaders long term is to get them into a habit of taking small consistent actions to improve.  Yet when we looked, there was no content or platform designed this way. So we built it.   Imagine your leaders taking action to improve each week. Actions that are perfectly aligned with your culture, values and business outcomes. This is the reality for our customers. Discover LeaderBits.io What makes us unique Small 15 minute experiences we call leadership challenges that are aligned with your company culture and the outcomes you want to achieve. What is a challenge? Short 3 minute video where you hear insight from an expert CXO leader, steps to take action and implement that experience within 10min. It’s fun and effective because it’s built how great leaders are made, by taking action. Coaching. To complete a challenge you make an entry into the reflect dB about your experience taking action as a leader with your team. Our leadership coaches then give you real feedback each week to help you improve even faster. Habit based. Our habit based delivery system makes it easy to improve on autopilot. You get your personalized challenges at the same time each week. And don’t worry, we have vacation mode.  LeaderBot. Personalization and motivation by LeaderBot AI.

Industries: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Fitness, Personal Health, Software
Description: GOLD is a global consumer health and fitness movement inspired by the Olympic Games. Award-winning Netflix film and iOS/Apple Watch app.
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Health Care, Science and Engineering, Software, Sports
Full Description: The Personal GOLD consumer AI fitness platform began when the Lance Armstrong drug scandal, termed 'The Greatest Fraud in American Sports', resulted in unexpected withdrawals of top U.S. men's professional cyclists due to performance enhancing drug use. Prior to the 2012 Olympic Games, Olympic athletes Sky Christopherson and Tamara Jenkins created a 'Dream Team' technology project to support the underfunded, understaffed US women's cycling team who had become America's hope for a cycling medal. Thought leaders in fields of human performance, and technology were assembled into a 'Dream Team', including digital medicine visionary Dr. Eric Topol. Personal GOLD (prior OAthlete) developed the first software platform to utilize consumer wearable technology, digital health, and a wireless sensor ecosystem for Olympic training that included genetics, environment, physiology, psychology, with big data aggregation. The underdog women shocked the world with a Silver Medal win in London, the subject of a feature-length documentary film called 'Personal Gold' (2015). Personal GOLD is expanding it's technology ecosystem to develop software products for health and fitness markets with the guidance of a world-class advisory team. The company will continue work with Olympic athletes under it's USA2028 initiative to inform product development and provide inspirational marketing narratives. This ethos serves the vision of helping individuals reach sustainable health and performance using Data not Drugs®
